key_components: Discrete-time hazard head, OOF-only calibration auto-mode, PatchTST/NHITS dual anchors.
risk: Calibration gain may not translate to ranking; enforce joint MAE+calibration gate.
verification_test: Brier/ECE/LogLoss/PR-AUC improvement with monotonic violation control.

key_components: Two-part count head, non-negative inverse-safe postprocess, spike sentinel, NBEATS/NHITS anchors.
risk: Over-clipping can suppress true extremes; monitor tail metrics and spike sentinel hit rate.
verification_test: investors_count median gap reduction vs V7 and catastrophic_spikes == 0.

key_components: Huber+Quantile dual objective, horizon-aware anchor switch, tail metrics gate (q90/q95).
risk: Tail-focused objectives can regress central tendency on short horizons.
verification_test: Tail pinball and MAE stability across horizon bands.
